summary: Defines an abstract base class for Azure Resource Manager (ARM) checks that examine a specific configuration property of a resource and raise a failure when the property contains negative or otherwise disallowed values. The class encapsulates metadata about the target key, the set of forbidden values (including regex patterns for variable-dependent expressions), and the logic to retrieve and evaluate the property within a resource definition, integrating with Checkov's checking framework.
